message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,000.  I believe it's worth even more than that to you, given its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $10,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $9,500?
